titleStmt.title: Choyce drollery, songs & sonnets being a collection of divers excellent pieces of poetry, of severall eminent authors, never before printed.
titleStmt.author: R. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Robert Pollard, and John Sweeting,

notesStmt.note: Does not contain leaf mentioned in Hazlitt, having 10 lines of verse beginning "Fames Windy trump."
It should be observed that in the preface the bookseller speaks of this as the "second" collection of the kind issued by him.
This book was ordered to be burned May 8 [1656?] cf. Sotheby catalogue. Sotheby (Britwell sale) April 1, 1924.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
